## Block.sendkey() method

Simulates a keystroke.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendkey(key: KeyMap, field?: string, clazz?: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | [KeyMap](./forms42core.keymap.md) | The keystroke to simulate. |
|  field | string | _(Optional)_ Optional parameter specifying the field from which the keystroke is sent. |
|  clazz | string | _(Optional)_ Optional parameter narrowing down to a specific field class. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves to a boolean indicating the success of the operation.
